resources.string: This application was made by Fedi Khayati for his Master\'s Final Project (Trabajo Fin de Máster), as part of the Master program in Development of Mobile Applications and Services (Máster en Desarrollo de Aplicaciones y Servicios para Móviles) at the Higher Technical School of Computer Systems Engineering, Polytechnic University of Madrid (Escuela Técnica Superior de Ingeniería de Sistemas Informáticos, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid) during the school year 2023/2024.
